name: Flying firefighters
description:
Extinguish fires with fun firefighters and save people. Upgraded your rescuers passing interesting missions.

Flying firefighters include many different levels and missions that will not get bored. In each location you are waiting for their bonuses and difficulties. Each level is distinguished by a colorful location, different characters and weather conditions.

the game is suitable for adults and children
The game has a very simple control: firemen are controlled by two arrows at the edges of the screen. Suitable for children from 5 years.

Flying Firemen is a bright arcade with a number of distinctive features:
- Many original and unique locations
- Development, pumping firefighters
- For each location has its own bonuses and obstacles
- Colorful and interesting levels
- Physics, not found in any destroyer of bricks
- Ability to play without an internet connection!
- The application is absolutely free!
- Game for children and parents
